description: This requirement is open to suppliers who pre-operator StreputsProfessional Service (TSPS) under E agency-18TSPS.\
full_summary:
# **Title**: One (1) Project Manager, Senior (Level 3)

## **Background**

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites pre-qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the provision of task and solutions professional services under the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) program. This procurement is part of a formal competitive process that aims to establish a result-driven and efficient method of supply for professional services. To qualify for this procurement, suppliers must be pre-qualified under the TSPS program.

## **Request for Proposal (RFP)**

The DND requires the services of one (1) Project Manager, Senior (Level 3) to support the Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM). The Project Manager will be responsible for managing various tasks and projects, including project planning, execution, and evaluation. The resources will be required to travel to DND sites within and outside of Canada.

## **Security Requirements**

Security clearance is required for this procurement. The service provider must hold an ASI level of security clearance with a DCSA (Defense Critical Infrastructure) clearance level of Secret or higher. The service provider is also required to complete a non-disclosure agreement (NDA) prior to contract commencement.

## **Requirements**

The service provider must be able to demonstrate the ability to deliver high-quality professional services in project management, with a focus on managing projects and teams. The service provider must also have experience working with the Canadian government and have a proven track record of delivering results-driven projects.

## **Key Dates**

* Tender closing date: November 7, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* Expected contract start date: November 15, 2023
* Expected contract end date: November 30, 2025

## **Submission Requirements**

Prospective service providers must submit their proposals electronically to the DND via email. The proposals must include all required documentation, including a company profile, a project management plan, and a budget plan. Late submissions will not be accepted.

## **Point of Contact**

For any inquiries regarding this procurement, please contact Khushbu Bakshi at DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca.

## **Trade Agreements**

This procurement is governed by the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
